original_text:
In Moab I will put an end
    to those who make offerings on the high places
    and burn incense to their gods,”
declares the Lord.
korean_text: 여호와의 말씀이라 모압 산당에서 제사하며 그 신들에게 분향하는 자를 내가 끊어버리리라

sentences.original_text: In Moab I will put an end
to those who make offerings on the high places
and burn incense to their gods
